text: This is a movie where they have one character that’s supposed to be funny but is just so annoying  that you’re just getting extremely irritated while watching.

It is not a Master Work but it is definitely better than the Critics make it out  to be. It is funny and easy watching. Perfect, after a long day of work with a beer when you just want to relax a bit and don't think to much. Not really sure why everyone is hating so much on Melissa, but i think she is funny and playing the mean Fat Girl really suited her.
Way better than the scores here - this is 60% at least
Why Netflix is spending money to have this dreadful movie on the platform is beyond me.
Great laughs for the entire family! A unique plot.
I thought this movie was very funny.  I have no idea what the reason for the low ratings is. The movie's funny, and Jason Bateman and Melissa McCarthy are great! Recommended!
This is one of those movies I’ll always stop and watch when it’s on. It’s hilarious and never gets old. It’s a new classic. Love Melissa and Jason—awesome comedy duo!
Saw this yesterday I believe. It was good fun.
This was alright for a one time watch...

i searched this movie to see where it was streaming then saw all of these low reviews. i’m so shocked. this was one of my favorite movies as a teen. it’s hilarious & will definitely have you laughing the entire way through. i used to watch this every other week when i needed a laugh. don’t listen to these reviews if you wanna laugh. it’s a ridiculous but very funny movie not worth the bad ratings. there are maybe 1 or two jokes that were offensive that i never caught onto as a teen that i do now as an adult but i never found those specific jokes funny anyways. nevertheless, good movie for those who like the humor in this movie.
Pretty good little dramatic but good
I put off watching this because of the bad reviews.  I'm so glad I watched it anyway.  This deserves far better reviews!
Melissa McCarthy and Jason Bateman save this movie. Unfortunately, there are several unbelievable scenes that stick out during the production.  The movie is worth a watch if you have time.

Melissa McCarthy is hilarious in this road movie with Jason Bateman along for the ride!
Plenty to keep you entertained and laughing the whole way!
This movie is the best! I love watching it! All Melissa McCarthy movies are amazing!
Any movie with Melissa McCarthy deserves the lowest rating she's not funny she's just a fat girl that's trying to be funny and over acts and she just sucks.
A few good laughs but mostly a big stretch on the plot - felt like they worked too hard on making it funny

Lame. Lame. Lame.  Melissa McCarthy is as terrible and annoying as always.  Jason Bateman deserves so much better.  Annoying, predictable, lame.  Untrue stereotypes and BORING.  Avoid this at all costs.
Would have to be one of the most pathetic movies made
